info.title: L’API CKAN de Gouvernement ouvert
info.description:
[FR]This API provides live access to the CKAN portion of the Open Government Portal and Registry systems.

- Portal: https://open.canada.ca
  - our public data portal
  - includes data federated from provinces and municipalities
  - read-only API calls can be made without an API key
  - authorization required only for publishing federated data

- Registry: https://registry.open.canada.ca
  - accessible within the Government of Canada (GoC) network
  - for collecting and publishing data from GoC departments
  - new datasets must be manually reviewed and approved by the Open Government team
  - publishes approved datasets to the Production Portal automatically
  - user account or API key required for all operations

Our Staging sites are for sharing upcoming features and testing integration, and Test sites
are for features in development.

get.description: Use this API to check that you can reach the server and to check its capabilities.
get.summary: Get the CKAN version and a list of installed extensions

200.description: Returns the CKAN version and a list of installed extensions

get.description: Note: our site uses the same value for the "name" and "id" fields of datasets
get.summary: Get a list of all package ids (datasets)

200.description: Returns a list of package ids

get.description: Searches for packages (datasets) matching the specified query terms

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A solr query string that will be used to filter and score results

parameters.name: fq
parameters.description:
A solr filter query that will facet results by removing non-matching items.
The available parameters may be discovered by interacting with the
facets on https://open.canada.ca/data/dataset and observing the
query parameters generated.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort order for the search results, defaults to `score desc, metadata_modified desc`
meaning sort by query score order, and with no query sort by most recently modified

parameters.name: rows
parameters.description: Maximum rows to return, clamped to 1000

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The offset from the beginning of results (0) for pagination

parameters.name: include_private
parameters.description:
Must be set to `true` to retrieve results on the Registry,
no effect on the Portal

200.description: List of packages (datasets) including all metadata available.

post.description: Searches for packages (datasets) matching the specified query terms

200.description: List of packages (datasets) including all metadata available.

get.description: Returns metadata about the package (dataset) corresponding to its UUID. Refer to the [open data schema (type=dataset)](https://open.canada.ca/data/api/action/scheming_dataset_schema_show?type=dataset) or the [open information schema (type=info)](https://open.canada.ca/data/api/action/scheming_dataset_schema_show?type=info) for information about the metadata fields returned.
get.summary: Get metadata about one specific package (dataset)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The package UUID

200.description: A package metadata object

get.description: Returns a package's activity stream, newest activities first
get.summary: Get the activity stream of a package (dataset)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The package UUID

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset of the first activity to return, used for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of activities to return

200.description: List of activities

get.description: Return an organization's activity stream, newest activites first
get.summary: Get the activity stream of an organization

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id or name (short form) of the organization

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset of the first activity to return, used for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of activities to return

200.description: List of an organization's activities

get.description: Return the organizations that the user has a given permission for
get.summary: Get organizations that a user has a given permission for

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The name or id of the user, defaults to the user making the request

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description: The permission the user has against the returned organization

200.description: List of organizations for given permission

get.description: Return the details of an organization
get.summary: Get details of a specific organization

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id or name (short form) of the organization

200.description: List organization details

get.description: Returns the names (short forms) of all indexed organizations

200.description: List of organizations

get.description: Search resources based on their field values. Note that [package_search](#/action/get_action_package_search) has better performance and more search functionality than this endpoint.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search criteria string or list of strings of the form ``{field}:{term1}``

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: A field on the resource model that orders the results

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Apply an offset to the query

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Apply a limit to the query

200.description: List of resources

get.description: Returns the metadata of a resource. Refer to the [resource_fields value in the dataset schema](https://open.canada.ca/data/api/action/scheming_dataset_schema_show?type=dataset) for information about the metadata fields.
get.summary: Get metadata for a specific resource

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the resource

parameters.name: include_tracking
parameters.description: Return tracking (usage) information

200.description: Return metadata of a resource

get.description:
The datastore_search action allows you to search data in a resource.

Well-formatted CSV files that are uploaded (not linked) are automatically
loaded into the datastore.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: id or alias of the resource to be searched against

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: matching conditions to select, `application/json` POST requests only

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: full text query searching across all columns in each row

parameters.name: distinct
parameters.description: return only distinct rows

parameters.name: plain
parameters.description: treat as plain text query

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: language of the full text query

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: maximum number of rows to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: offset this number of rows

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: comma-separated string of column names to return

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: comma-separated string of column names with sort order

parameters.name: include_total
parameters.description: calculate and return the total number of matching rows, set to false for improved performance

parameters.name: records_format
parameters.description: the format for the records return value, set to `csv` or `tsv` for improved performance

200.description: List of packages (datasets) including all metadata available.

post.description:
The datastore_search action allows you to search data in a resource.

Well-formatted CSV files that are uploaded (not linked) are automatically
loaded into the datastore.

200.description: List of packages (datasets) including all metadata available.

get.description:
Dataset metadata schemas are defined in the [ckanext-scheming](https://github.com/ckan/ckanext-scheming)
format.
get.summary: Return the schema for a dataset type

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The dataset type

200.description: Returns metadata schema

post.description:
The exact fields available will depend on the `type` parameter.

Refer to the [open data schema (type=dataset)](https://open.canada.ca/data/api/action/scheming_dataset_schema_show?type=dataset)
or the [open information schema (type=info)](https://open.canada.ca/data/api/action/scheming_dataset_schema_show?type=info)
for information about all the metadata fields available.

200.description: a copy of the dataset metadata created

post.description:
The exact fields available will depend on the `type` parameter.

Refer to the [open data schema (type=dataset)](https://open.canada.ca/data/api/action/scheming_dataset_schema_show?type=dataset)
or the [open information schema (type=info)](https://open.canada.ca/data/api/action/scheming_dataset_schema_show?type=info)
for information about all the metadata fields available.

200.description: a copy of the dataset metadata updated

post.description:
Any fields not passed will retain their original values.

The exact fields available will depend on the `type` parameter.

Refer to the [open data schema (type=dataset)](https://open.canada.ca/data/api/action/scheming_dataset_schema_show?type=dataset)
or the [open information schema (type=info)](https://open.canada.ca/data/api/action/scheming_dataset_schema_show?type=info)
for information about all the metadata fields available.
post.summary: Update only specific fields of an existing dataset (package)

200.description: a copy of the dataset metadata updated

post.description: Remove a dataset and all its resources including uploaded files (where applicable).

200.description: null

post.description: Add a resource to a dataset (package). POST using `multipart/form-data` to upload a file.

q.description: A solr query string that will be used to filter and score results

fq.description:
A solr filter query that will facet results by removing non-matching items.
The available parameters may be discovered by interacting with the
facets on https://open.canada.ca/data/dataset and observing the
query parameters generated.

sort.description:
Sort order for the search results, defaults to `score desc, metadata_modified desc`
meaning sort by query score order, and with no query sort by most recently modified

rows.description: Maximum rows to return, clamped to 1000

start.description: The offset from the beginning of results (0) for pagination

include_private.description:
Must be set to `true` to retrieve results on the Registry,
no effect on the Portal

owner_org.description: Titre de l’organisation actuelle (organisme ou ministère du GC) principalement responsable de publier le jeu de données

creator.description: Entités individuelles (personnes) principalement responsables de produire le jeu de données (séparer les multiples entités par des virgules)

maintainer_email.description: Courriel de la personne-ressource à contacter au sujet du jeu de données ou de l’ensemble de données

subject.description: Le sujet du contenu du jeu de données. Vous pouvez sélectionner ou désélectionner de multiples sujets (Ctrl+Clic)

audience.description: Description de l’audience ou du groupe de personnes pour lequel le jeu de données décrit est destiné ou utile. Vous pouvez sélectionner ou désélectionner de multiples options (Ctrl+Clic)

place_of_publication.description: La région où le jeu de données a été publié initialement. Vous pouvez sélectionner ou désélectionner de multiples options (Ctrl+Clic)

spatial.description: Étendue de l’applicabilité spatiale d’un produit. Cet élément peut inclure un cadre de délimitation ou une chaîne GeoJson.

geographic_region.description: Région géographique d’un jeu de données. Vous pouvez sélectionner ou désélectionner de multiples régions (Ctrl+Clic)

time_period_coverage_start.description: Date de début de la période couverte par le jeu de données (AAAA-MM-JJ)

time_period_coverage_end.description: Date de fin de la période couverte par le jeu de données (AAAA-MM-JJ)

date_published.description: Date de publication du jeu de données (AAAA-MM-JJ)

date_modified.description: Date à laquelle le jeu de données a été mis à jour (AAAA-MM-JJ)

federated_date_modified.description: Date à laquelle le jeu de données du partenaire de données fédérées a été modifié (AAAA-MM-JJ)

digital_object_identifier.description: L'identificateur d'objet numérique assigné au jeu de données. Pour obtenir de plus amples renseignements, veuillez consulter le site http://cisti-icist.nrc-cnrc.gc.ca/fra/services/icist/datacite-canada/index.html

license_id.description: Licence s’appliquant au jeu de données

portal_release_date.description: La date à laquelle le jeu de données peut être publié dans le portail (AAAA-MM-JJ)

unique_identifier.description: Expression ou chaîne unique désignant la ressource.

date_published.description: Date officielle d’émission (c.-à-d. de publication) de la ressource

language.description: Langue de la ressource. Vous pouvez sélectionner ou désélectionner de multiples langues (Ctrl+Clic).

url.description: Emplacement pour l’accès en ligne aux fins de la distribution de la ressource.

Typederecord.title: Typederecord
Typederecord.description: Portail auquel appartient le dossier connexe

Typedecontent.title: Typedecontent
Typedecontent.description: Nature ou genre du contenu de la ressource

Jeudecaractères.title: Jeudecaractères
Jeudecaractères.description: Nom complet de la norme de codage des caractères utilisée pour le ressource

Format.title: Format
Format.description: Format du fichier, support physique ou dimensions de la ressource

Typedecollection.title: Typedecollection
Typedecollection.description: Collection (propre au domaine) à laquelle appartient le dossier de métadonnées, par exemple : données non spatiales

Fréquenced'entretienetdemiseàjour.title: Fréquenced'entretienetdemiseàjour
Fréquenced'entretienetdemiseàjour.description: Fréquence à laquelle les changements et les ajouts sont apportés au jeu de données initial

Juridiction.title: Juridiction
Juridiction.description: Étendue de l’autorité judiciaire, de l’autorité d’application de la loi ou d’un autre type d’autorité. Par exemple, l'ordre de gouvernement ayant fourni le jeu de données.

Restrictionsd'accès.title: Restrictionsd'accès
Restrictionsd'accès.description: Restrictions d’accès du jeu de données

Prêtàpublier.title: Prêtàpublier
Prêtàpublier.description: La sélection de l’option « Oui » désigne le jeu de données comme prêt à être publié par l'entremise du Portail du gouvernement ouvert. Si l’option « Non » est sélectionnée, il sera sauvegardé comme une « ébauche ». Si le jeu de données a déjà été publié dans le portail, le fait de sélectionner « Non » fera en sorte qu’il ne le sera plus.

Typedereprésentationspatiale.title: Typedereprésentationspatiale
Typedereprésentationspatiale.description: Le format dans lequel la ressource est disponible

resource_id.description: id or alias of the resource to be searched against

filters.description: matching conditions to select, `application/json` POST requests only

language.description: language of the full text query

limit.description: maximum number of rows to return

sort.description: comma-separated string of column names with sort order

include_total.description: calculate and return the total number of matching rows, set to false for improved performance

RecordsFormat1.title: RecordsFormat1
RecordsFormat1.description: the format for the records return value, set to `csv` or `tsv` for improved performance

tags.name: Action
tags.description:
### CKAN's Action API is a powerful, RPC-style API that exposes all of CKAN's core features

All endpoints support POST requests with an `application/json` or a
  `multipart/form-data` body.
- Use an `application/json` POST request when nested json parameters
  are required
- Use a `multipart/form-data` POST request when file uploads are required

Read-only endpoints (`*_show`, `*_list`, `*_search` etc.)
accept GET requests with query parameters.

Responses are returned in a JSON envelope on success:
```json
{
  "help": "url to complete endpoint help",
  "success": true,
  "result": {...}
}
```
or on errors:
```json
{
  "help": "url to complete endpoint help",
  "success": false,
  "error": {
    "__type": "error type",
    "message": "error message",
    "field-with-error": ["first-error", "second-error"],
    ...
  }
}
```
